p.k: While playing a video game, Mordecai and Rigby make a bet in which the loser of the game has to wear a blonde hairstyle. Rigby cheats. / Mordecai wants to ask Margaret to be his girlfriend / The guys must help Muscle Man stop fighting in his sleep. / Mordecai and Rigby have to save Benson from an evil party. / Mordecai and Rigby are forced to work under Muscle Man and endure his repetitive jokes.
